info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 8:02PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Schenectady, northeastern Albany, southeastern Saratoga, southern Washington, Rensselaer and southwestern Bennington Counties through 830 PM EST... At 801 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Saratoga Springs to near Altamont. Movement was southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Schenectady, Troy, Bennington, Clifton Park, Rotterdam, Saratoga Springs, Cohoes, Watervliet, Colonie, Scotia, Mechanicville, Hoosick Falls, Arlington, Latham, Niskayuna, Ballston Spa, Menands, Shaftsbury, Pownal and Green Island. This includes the following highways... Interstate 88 near exit 25. Interstate 90 between exits 25 and 26. Interstate 890 between exits 1a and 9. Interstate 87 between exits 4 and 7, and between exits 8A and 16. Interstate 787 between exits 7 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
